about_the_game:
Welcome to North America, circa 1910, Travelers! 

Build a railway empire for the ages with the USA 1910 Ticket Pack! With three game modes added to your base game*, you’ve got plenty of ways to make your mark in the history books!

INCLUDES:

  • USA 1910 – Aim for the Globetrotter bonus as you complete new tickets from the 1910 deck! 

  • BIG CITIES – You’ll be dealt four Big Cities tickets at the start of the game. These special tickets all connect to the same major cities. 

  • MEGA GAME – Create the ultimate historic experience and combine all existing tickets in one game to achieve impressive high scores!

Your railway empire is history in the making!

(*USA 1910 Ticket Pack requires the Ticket to Ride base game, sold separately.)

short_description: Become an American legend! Travel back to USA 1910 and begin your railway empire once more. Enjoy three new game modes and earn a historic victory!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
